message: 'package' should be separated from previous statement.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.ByteArrayInputStream' import. Should be before 'org.apache.metron.common.utils.JSONUtils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.io.IOException' import. Should be before 'org.apache.metron.common.utils.JSONUtils'.
Import statement for 'org.apache.metron.common.configuration.ConfigurationType.PROFILER' is in the wrong order. Should be in the 'STATIC' group, expecting not assigned imports on this line.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
